qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Monthly subscription fees are the most popular pricing model nowadays
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve taxas de assinatura mensais como o modelo de precificação mais popular, evidenciando um modelo baseado em assinaturas no contexto SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: 67.2% of the vendors used single payment frequency, while 30% used multiple payment frequency options and complementary bulk payment discount incentive
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra estratégias de precificação flexíveis com diferentes frequências de pagamento e descontos para pagamentos em massa.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: SaaS where there is a price per user per month
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve modelo de precificação por usuário com periodicidade mensal, típico de SaaS baseado em assinatura.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: Under the rental model, there is a monthly fee
qualitative_analysis.justification: O modelo de aluguel com taxa mensal representa uma abordagem orientada a serviço com pagamentos recorrentes.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Strategy and business model evolution at Adobe: Competing in digital media software industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Subscribers could now pay $49.99/month for a 1-year commitment.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo de assinatura mensal com compromisso anual, representando a transição da Adobe para modelo SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Spillover Effects and Freemium Strategy in the Mobile App Market
qualitative_analysis.quote: Fruit Ninja is available for free with a separate paid version for a price of $1.99.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra modelo freemium no mercado de aplicativos móveis com versão gratuita e versão paga com pagamento único.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Current practices and emerging trends of transit apps for fixed-route bus services in the US
qualitative_analysis.quote: The ongoing costs could be an annual lump sum (ranging from $100,000 to $500,000) or a charge per transaction
qualitative_analysis.justification: Apresenta flexibilidade de modelos de precificação, combinando assinatura anual com modelo pay-per-transaction baseado em uso.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: At launch, Apple Music charged a $9.99/month subscription fee for an individual user and $14.99/month for a family
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra modelo de assinatura mensal com diferentes tiers de preços (individual vs família), mostrando flexibilidade na precificação.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: Typically, the price of a core bundle of SaaS applications is for a monthly, yearly, or permanent license
qualitative_analysis.justification: Mostra modelo híbrido combinando diferentes periodicidades de pagamento (mensal, anual) e até licença permanente em contexto SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Converting free users to paid subscribers in the SaaS context: The impact of marketing touchpoints, message content, and usage
qualitative_analysis.quote: customers pay a monthly or annual subscription fee
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo típico de assinatura SaaS com opções de pagamento mensal ou anual.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Development of service-dominant business model for CAE software industry in Greater China: a case study
qualitative_analysis.quote: they spent approximately 17 euros per component for running a flow simulation

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Business Case for a Journey Planning and Ticketing App—Comparison between a Simulation Analysis and Real-World Data
qualitative_analysis.quote: monthly operating profitability

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Software as a service: Lessons from the video game industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: By paying a monthly fee, gamers will be given access to all the games the platform has to offer

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Making a Business Out of (Predictive Application Management in) the Fog
qualitative_analysis.quote: Asset Manufacturers should pay yearly license fees

qualitative_analysis.quote: The chosen option was a subscription model based on a fixed monthly fee

qualitative_analysis.quote: The current fee structure is a layered monthly subscription-based model

qualitative_analysis.article_title: How Service Offerings and Operational Maturity Influence the Viability of Health Information Exchanges
qualitative_analysis.quote: Other members have a per-member, per-month subscription fee based on value-added service structures.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Mobile ticketing services in the Northern Europe: Critical business model issues
qualitative_analysis.quote: Possible billing options were monthly invoices or credit/debit card payments

qualitative_analysis.quote: for a fee of $20,000 per year, the department can see where bikers speed up or slow down

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Making Digital Freemium Business Models a Success: Predicting Customers' Lifetime Value via Initial Purchase Information
qualitative_analysis.quote: Combined, they have more than 1.3 million registered users, approx. 57,000 of whom are paying customers, spending more than €3 million in more than 195,000 credit purchases

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Understanding the influence of absorptive capacity and ambidexterity on the process of business model change – the case of on-premise and cloud-computing software
qualitative_analysis.quote: As all case companies offer SaaS on a pay-per-use basis, cash flows in continuously but less predictably. With on-premise business, customers usually pay a one-time license fee and an annual fee for longer-term maintenance contracts.
qualitative_analysis.justification: Contrasta modelo pay-per-use contínuo do SaaS com modelo híbrido tradicional de licença perpétua + manutenção anual.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: IT vendors are now collecting periodic subscription fee, suggesting that the key to survival under the new circumstance is to keep the cash flow going
qualitative_analysis.justification: Transformação do modelo de receita para assinaturas periódicas, mantendo fluxo de caixa contínuo no contexto cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: we are now increasingly moving towards a model in which we charge a monthly rental fee. Then customers don't have to make an investment decision – the customer just pays the monthly rental fee
qualitative_analysis.justification: Transição para modelo de aluguel mensal reduzindo barreiras de entrada e custo de troca para clientes.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: the fee for a short-term rental agreement was higher than for a long-term contract
qualitative_analysis.justification: Estratégia de precificação flexível diferenciando contratos de curto e longo prazo.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economic and business perspectives on smartphones as multi-sided platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: Mobile advertising revenues reached $3.18 billion in the U.S. in 2012
qualitative_analysis.justification: Monetização através de publicidade móvel em plataforma multi-sided, gerando receita de dados/uso.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Crushing Candy: The Free-to-Play Game in Its Connective Commodity Form
qualitative_analysis.quote: In the second half of August we transitioned Candy Crush mobile to virtual currency called King gold bars in our games

qualitative_analysis.quote: prices ranging from $0.99 to $39.95
qualitative_analysis.justification: Estratégia freemium no mercado de apps móveis com ampla faixa de precificação para versões pagas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Monthly subscription fees are the most popular pricing model nowadays... software vendors encourage clients to prepay their subscriptions
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelo de assinatura mensal com incentivo a pré-pagamento, demonstrando flexibilidade estratégica em SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: In case of subscription, the customer pays a regular subscription fee – commonly a monthly charge – and in return gains the right to use the product for the paid period
